description: Try our easy to follow Potato, Chorizo & Leek Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Potato, Chorizo & Leek Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tsp olive oil (save 1 tbs olive oil)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add chorizo and cook for 4-5 minutes, stirring often, or until chorizo is golden. Using a slotted spoon, transfer to a paper towel-lined bowl.
Add leek to pan. Cover and cook over medium-low heat for 10 minutes or until soft. Add potato and season with salt and pepper.

Add stock and simmer for 15 minutes or until potato is soft. Remove from heat and pur√©e with a stick blender until smooth. Stir in cream and season to taste. Add three-quarters of the chorizo and reheat over low heat until warmed through.

Meanwhile, to make the herbed crumbs, finely chop remaining chorizo. Heat oil and butter in a frying pan over medium heat. Add chorizo and breadcrumbs, and cook for 4 minutes, stirring regularly. Add herbs and zest, and cook for a further 1-2 minutes or until crumbs are golden. Serve soup topped with crumbs.
